mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ym_board VALUES ( board_seq.nextval, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, 0, sysdate, #{board_re_ref}, 0, 0, #{user_no} )
mapper.select: SELECT max(board_re_ref) AS refcnt FROM ym_board

SELECT b.board_no AS board_no, b.board_title AS board_title, (SELECT u.user_name FROM ym_user u WHERE b.user_no=u.user_no ) AS user_name, b.board_reg_time AS board_reg_time, b.board_read_cnt AS board_read_cnt FROM ym_board b ORDER BY board_no desc
SELECT ym_board.*, ym_user.user_no, ym_user.user_name FROM ym_board, ym_user WHERE ym_board.user_no = ym_user.user_no AND ym_board.board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE ym_board SET board_title = #{board_title}, board_content = #{board_content} WHERE board_no = #{board_no}
